main event: Four elliptical shaped objects emitting a bright yellow glow were observed in Bethesda, Maryland on June 22, 1955.
interesting points: The objects were approximately the size of a dime,Moving from NE to W at an estimated altitude of 40,000 feet,No sound was detected during the sighting,The observation lasted for about 20 seconds,Limited information led to the possibility they were USAF aircraft.
sighted object: four elliptical shaped objects glowing yellow
witness description: ground observation with seven power binoculars
